summary: Tested Water/Meal logging in Kaizer Fit module and Telugu translations. Backend APIs (11 tests) all passed. Frontend water/meal logging works correctly - data persists to backend. Fixed overlay issue blocking water/calorie + buttons.

issues: Console warning: chart width/height -1 - minor chart sizing issue on initial load
Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement

context_for_next_testing_agent: Water/Meal logging in Kaizer Fit module fully tested and working. APIs persist data to MongoDB. Frontend loads data on page mount via fetchAllData(). Fixed overlay issue with decorative emoji elements blocking + buttons. Telugu translations working - toggle button in header switches language, translations appear on dashboard and Kaizer Fit page. OTP authentication uses static 123456.
